name: earphone
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of electronic equipment, usually one of a pair, that you put into or over your ear so that you can listen privately to the radio, recorded music, etc.: a pair/set of earphones (= these two objects and usually also the wire or piece that joins them) I put my earphones on/in and listened. The defendant had to listen to the court proceedings in translation through earphones. Compare
earbud
headphones
ozanuysal/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesYou will be provided with a set of earphones to use on the flight.He sat with earphones clamped over his ears. These stereo earphones provide noise cancellation and allow you to enjoy your music with a rich, full sound.He wears an earphone that allows him to hear the police radio scanner.She gave me her earphone so we could listen to the music together.
